channel.title: IS there a way if i kill a npc i get a npc poins or something READ PLZ
channel.description: So if i kill a king back dragon or whatever it give automatic a point, Or it drops 9 (put in npc drops) but make a shop with armadyl godsword or something and you can pay with that ticket? Can some1 help me ?
